bike.description: Specialized FSR technology, A1 Premium Aluminum TransForm Monocoque frame, ORE technology down tube, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots, ITch Switch 100/130mm on the fly adjustable travel, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox Float RL, air spring and rebound adj., compression lock-out, travel adjust ITch Switch, 7.625" x 2.0"
Rockshox Psylo SL, compression lockout, external rebound adjust, 80-125mm adjustable travel
1 1/8" Threadless, 3x sealed, black alloy cups, cartridge bearings, ultralight alloy top cap and bolt
Aluminum, 4 bolt, 7 degree rise, black
Specialized Enduro Mid Rise bar, 6066 Alloy, 6 degree upsweep, 8 degree backsweep, 640mm width
Specialized MTB grip, black, double density Kraton
Hayes HFX-9 full hydraulic disc, 6" rotor (Note: Some bikes appear with Shimano M-555 hydraulic disc brakes)
Hayes HFX-9 full hydraulic disc, 6" rotor (Note: Some bikes appear with Shimano M-555 hydraulic disc brakes)
Hayes HFX-9 (Note: Some bikes appear with Shimano M-555 hydraulic disc)
Shimano M-570 LX, 34.9 clamp, bottom pull
Shimano M-952 XTR, long cage, standard spring
Shimano M-570 LX, 9 speed
Shimano HG-50 LX, 11/34
Shimano HG-73
Specialized Strongarm 7050, XT Spline
44Ax32Ax22S, 7050 alloy 4mm thick outer ring, 4 bolt 104/64mm pattern, Steel chainring bolts
Shimano ES-30 Octalink spline, 68mm shell width, 113mm spindle length
Shimano 515 clipless
Mavic X223, 26", black, welded seam, eyelets
Specialized Stout disc, 28 hole, sealed cartridge bearings, 9mm Skraxle
Shimano M-525 Disc, 32 hole, loose ball bearings, alloy Q/R
DT Swiss 1.8mm stainless, black, alloy nipples, 261/258mm front, 258/259mm rear
Specialized Enduro Pro 2.2", aramid bead, 120 tpi
Specialized Enduro Pro 2.2", aramid bead, 120 tpi
Specialized Ultralight, presta valve
Specialized Body Geometry technology, hollow Cr-Mo rails
2014 Alloy, black, 30.9 x 350/400mm
Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, seatpost water bottle mount, reflectors, owners manual
